Moderation.tempmute: Prevent the user from chatting temporarily
Moderation.purge: Delete the messages with the given amount

Music.join: Join the user's current voice chat
Music.play: Play a song when given name or YT link

Special Commands.korean: Send a random korean word with english translation and definiton
Special Commands.randomsong: Send a random spotify song url with given genre. Default genre = pop
Special Commands.searchsong: Return the URL of a song if provided with the name
Special Commands.searchartist: Return the URL of an artist if provided with the name
Special Commands.google: Return the first link if provided with a query
Special Commands.tarot: Send a random card from the Tarot Cards
